summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1822, for the improvement of West Forty-seventh Street, in the City of Seattle, from the east margin of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest to the west margin of Seventeenth Avenue Northwest, by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 19014, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
